entry.title: Comuna 13 Tote
entry.summary:
Vendor: Juliana & Camilo
Type: Sep Style
Price: 24.00

One of our original choices for a company logo. The design was so awesome that we needed to have it in our lineup.Based on an actual scene in Comuna 13 by Juliana and Camilo.

Sustainability meets Style with this organic cotton tote bag. Whether it's reducing plastic consumption while grocery shopping or your beach go-to, this bag won't disappoint. 

• 100% certified organic cotton 3/1 twill
• Fabric weight: 8 oz/yd² (272 g/m²)
• Dimensions: 16” x 14 ½” x 5”
• Weight limit: 30lbs (13.6 kg)
• 1” wide dual straps, 24 1/2" length
• Open main compartment

entry.title: Comuna 13 Tee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Juliana & Camilo
Type: Sep Style
Price: 28.00

One of our original choices for a company logo. The design was so awesome that we needed to have it in our lineup.Based on an actual scene in Comuna 13 by Juliana and Camilo.

The durable tri-blend fabric creates a vintage, fitted look.

• Tri-blend construction (50% polyester/25% combed ring-spun cotton/25% rayon)
• 40 singles thread weight
• Comfortable and durable
• Contemporary fit
• Lightweight

Size Chart

  XS S M L XL 2XL
Length (inches) 27 28 29 30 31 32
Width (inches) 16 ½ 18 20 22 24 26
